channel.title: [317 Delta] skill cape shop
channel.description:
could someone help me set up a shop which only displays the skillcapes you can wear
for example if you have 1 99 and that 99 is attack
it will display Attack untrimmed cape only
however if you have 2 99's like attack and hitpoints
it will display trimmed attack and trimmed hit points
any help would be great
thanks
